Part A

Dear Mr. Lin,

The phenomenon that Our arrogant members deceived innocent CD-ROM in order to fulfil their own desire has arouse much concern.Advocates proclaim that CD-ROM have a certain degree of responsibility to protect their privacy and check the IQ for fear that they will be defrauded again.Yet,skeptics insist this is detrimental to the mental health of CD-Rom.While people's view is divergent,I support the idea that CD-ROM should be reprehensible for their stupidity .

To commence with,our members have nothing wrong on this issue.Instead,CD-rom should go to hospital for a IQ test to check how stupid they are.
Apparently,their IQ is far beyond less than a human being even a creature.i take teethjoe as an example,he is the CEO of hkgolden,but he became a handicapped person from six years old.Devoid of intelligence,he worked hard and tried his utmost efforts to demolish a multitude of obstacles what he was facing.Having combated the myriad of difficulties,he finally finished his ITDOG degree in University and step into that society.What I want to pinpoint is not how good he is.he is pretty smart compared to everyone,though.Suffering from retarded disorder is not the fault of cd-rom itself but DNA.I highly recommend those people who sent the selfie to our members for a bare invitation code to check your IQ that what is going on.

Seldom have I heard such ridiculous issue occured;however,it is find and I find this unbearable.
Allowing them to be a member of LIHKG ,it will have a devastating consequences to the quality of member.

Yours Sincerely,
Chris Wong
